title: Ripley
description: Unfinished. Ellen Ripley (Sigourney Weaver) in Aliens.

title: Seed of Destruction
description: Sketches taken from pages of Mike Mignola's Hellboy: Seed of Destruction graphic novel.

title: Vermin Host
description: Bloodborne enemy: It sometimes begins as an ordinary huntsman, then undergoes a horrid transformation. The snakes which emerges from its head will lunge at the Hunter while the former huntsman's body swings its weapon in blind arcs.
